titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
1936 WORTHING -Dec. 12. 1936 Oct 21 They walk in the city Oct 31. 31. Faithful Lovers. Nov. 6. Nov. 6. Daniel Deronda. 2 vols. Nov. 24. 24. Gone with the Wind. Dec. 5 Interrupted. 7 days left. Dec 14. San Felice. Dec 19 Renewed. Dec 21 - March 21st: pd Dec 14 40v 19 Thinking Reed. Dec 31 31 Butterfield Eight Jan 5. Jan 5. Danger in the Dark. Jan 7 Jan. 7 The portrait of a lady Jan 16 16. Come and Get it. Jan 21. 21 Far Forest. Jan 30 30 Vein of Iron _ Feb 8 8. Crimson Hair Murders Feb. 12 12. Green Marquis 18 18 Together and apart. March 2 March 2. Broom Stages. March 13 13. Busman's Honeymoon. March 25 25 Tender is the Night April 2 25 Little red Houses " 2. April 2. Captain Nicholas. April 8 8 Imitation of Life April 24 24 Vestal Fire. May. 4. May 4 Maid and Minx May 11 Renewed. March 21 - June 21. 40. 11. Venetian Blinds. Mar. 19. 19. Figure Away. Mar 28. 27 Ballerina. June 3 June 3 Burmese Days June 14 14 Open the Door. June 24
WORTHING
June 24. Honorable estate.
Mrs Worthing died. July. 1937.
book not returned.
Mr Worthing's. telephone number
Suffrence. 31.00.
